algorithm_technique: Iterate through the array, check if index modulo 10 equals the element value.
problem_summary_simple: Find the smallest index where the index modulo 10 matches the value at that index.
problem_summary_technical: Linear scan of the array, checking the condition `i % 10 == nums[i]` for each index `i`.
key_insights: The modulo operation `i % 10` effectively checks the last digit of the index.
A generator expression with `next()` is an efficient way to find the first occurrence.
